help.openwhisk.invoke.action: Invokes an OpenWhisk action in the active namespace.
help.openwhisk.show.actions: Lists all of the OpenWhisk actions in the active namespace.
help.openwhisk.show.namespaces: Lists all of the OpenWhisk namespaces.
openwhisk.nlc.action.handling: I have trouble handling actions that include spaces, try renaming the action or using *openwhisk invoke action [action]*
openwhisk.invoke.in.progress: I will invoke your Openwhisk action *%s* now.
openwhisk.namespace.none: I cound't find any Openwhisk namespaces.
openwhisk.namespace.not.found: You don't have an Openwhisk namespace called *%s*.
openwhisk.namespaces.in.progress: I will get a list of the Openwhisk namespaces.
openwhisk.show.actions: Here is the list of actions for the *%s* namespace.
openwhisk.show.failure: Failed to list actions for *%s* namespace.
openwhisk.show.in.progress: I will get your list of Openwhisk actions for space *%s*.
openwhisk.show.not.found: I couldn't find any actions in the *%s* namespace.
cognitive.parse.problem.action: I'm having problems understanding the action name. To invoke an action use *openwhisk invoke action [action]*
cognitive.parse.problem.namespace: I'm having problems understanding the provided namespace. To set the namespace use *openwhisk set namespace [namespace]*
